description: This source file contains repository classes for managing and querying inventory-related data such as locations, lots, and inventory transactions within a manufacturing system, utilizing SQLAlchemy and asynchronous database sessions.

classes.name: LocationRepository
classes.description: Repository class for handling location data operations, including listing and retrieving location details.

classes.name: LotRepository
classes.description: Repository class for handling lot (batch) data operations, including listing lots with optional filters.

classes.name: InventoryTransactionRepository
classes.description: Repository class for managing inventory transaction records, including listing transactions filtered by lot ID.

methods.name: List[Location] list_locations(self, limit: int = 100, offset: int = 0)
methods.description: Retrieves a list of location records, ordered by location code, supporting pagination.

methods.name: Optional[Location] get_location(self, location_id: UUID)
methods.description: Fetches a single location by its UUID, returning None if not found.

methods.name: List[Lot] list_lots( self, *, item_sku: Optional[str], status: Optional[str], limit: int, offset: int )
methods.description: Retrieves a list of lots, optionally filtered by item SKU and status, with pagination.

methods.name: List[InventoryTransaction] list_transactions( self, *, lot_id: Optional[UUID], limit: int, offset: int )
methods.description: Retrieves a list of inventory transactions, optionally filtered by lot ID, with pagination.

ctags.name: get_location
ctags.pattern: /^    async def get_location(self, location_id: UUID) -> Optional[Location]:$/

ctags.name: list_locations
ctags.pattern: /^    async def list_locations(self, limit: int = 100, offset: int = 0) -> List[Location]:$/

ctags.name: list_lots
ctags.signature: ( self, *, item_sku: Optional[str], status: Optional[str], limit: int, offset: int )

ctags.name: list_transactions
ctags.signature: ( self, *, lot_id: Optional[UUID], limit: int, offset: int )
